statements.select: SELECT B.IP_ADDR, B.PORT_NO, B.SID_NM, B.CONN_ID, B.CONN_PWD FROM INFOUSER.BASE_SITE_INFO A ,INFOUSER.BASE_CONN_INFO B WHERE A.SITE_CD = #SITE_CD# AND B.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND B.SITE_CD = A.SITE_CD

SELECT US.USER_ID, US.USER_PWD ,DECODE(( SELECT SYS_CD FROM INFOUSER.SYS_USER_MAP UM WHERE US.USER_ID = UM.USER_ID AND US.DEPT_CD = UM.DEPT_CD AND UM.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# ), NULL, 0 , 1) SYS_CD FROM INFOUSER.BASE_SITE_INFO BS ,INFOUSER.SITE_DEPT_INFO DE ,INFOUSER.SYS_USER_INFO US WHERE BS.SITE_CD = DE.SITE_CD AND DE.DEPT_CD = US.DEPT_CD AND US.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND BS.SITE_CD = #SITE_CD#

SELECT USER_ID ,SYS_CD ,MNU_CD ,MNU_NM ,MNU_DESC ,MNU_PATH ,MNU_IMG ,UPPER_CD ,MNU_STEP ,ORD ,DECODE(MIN(MNU_AUTH_ORD), '1', 'N', '2', 'W', '3', 'R') MNU_AUTH FROM ( SELECT USER_MAP.USER_ID ,GRP_MAP.SYS_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_NM ,GRP_MAP.MNU_DESC ,GRP_MAP.MNU_PATH ,GRP_MAP.MNU_IMG ,GRP_MAP.UPPER_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_STEP ,GRP_MAP.ORD ,GRP_MAP.GRP_ID ,GRP_MAP.MNU_AUTH ,DECODE(GRP_MAP.MNU_AUTH, 'N', 1, 'W', 2, 'R', 3) MNU_AUTH_ORD FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID, B.SYS_CD, GRP_ID FROM INFOUSER.SYS_USER_INFO A ,INFOUSER.SYS_USER_MAP B ,INFOUSER.SYS_GRP_USER_MAP C WHERE A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND C.SYS_CD = B.SYS_CD ) USER_MAP ,( SELECT A.SYS_CD, A.MNU_CD, A.MNU_NM, A.MNU_DESC, A.MNU_PATH, A.MNU_IMG, A.UPPER_CD, A.MNU_STEP, A.ORD, B.GRP_ID, B.MNU_AUTH FROM INFOUSER.SYS_MNU_INFO A ,INFOUSER.SYS_MNU_GRP_MAP B ,INFOUSER.SYS_GRP_INFO C WHERE A.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.SYS_CD = A.SYS_CD AND B.MNU_CD = A.MNU_CD AND C.GRP_ID = B.GRP_ID AND C.SYS_CD = A.SYS_CD ) GRP_MAP WHERE GRP_MAP.SYS_CD = USER_MAP.SYS_CD AND GRP_MAP.GRP_ID = USER_MAP.GRP_ID ) GROUP BY USER_ID, SYS_CD, MNU_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC,MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD ORDER BY USER_ID, SYS_CD, ORD

,USER_PWD = #USER_PWD#
,POS_CD = #POS_CD# ,ETC = #ETC# ,USE_YN = #USE_YN# ,EDT_ID = #EDT_ID# ,EDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
statements.select: SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, UPPER_CD, DEPT_STEP, ORD FROM infouser.SITE_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DEPT_STEP ASC, ORD ASC
SELECT USER_ID ,DEPT_CD ,USER_NM ,USER_TEL ,USER_PWD ,POS_CD ,ETC FROM infouser.SYS_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT MST.MST_CD, MST.NM MST_NM, MST.ETC MST_ETC, DTL.DTL_CD, DTL.NM DTL_NM, DTL.ETC DTL_ETC FROM infouser.CD_MST_INFO MST ,CD_DTL_INFO DTL WHERE MST.MST_CD = #MST_CD# AND MST.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MST.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL.MST_CD = MST.MST_CD AND DTL.DEL_YN = MST.DEL_YN AND DTL.USE_YN = MST.USE_YN
